work_summary: Executed universal handoff workflow and synchronized all required shared-state artifacts
Published release context already in place (branch and v1.5.0 tag) and aligned session metadata
Updated TASK_LOG and SESSION_INDEX with new CodeX handoff task/session references

context_for_next_agent.notes: Full handoff artifacts are now synchronized. Unrelated dirty/untracked files from multi-agent activity still exist; avoid reverting unrelated work.

Main migration implementation and baseline validations were completed (v1.4.0).
Phase 2 live chat component direction and UX patterns were established.
Migration phasing and architectural constraints were documented.
